meanings.sent1: The tablecloth was made of soft linen.

meanings.sent1: He wore a crisp linen shirt to the party.

meanings.sent3: The linen apron protected her clothes while she cooked.
meanings.sent4: His honesty was as pure as the white linen he always wore.
meanings.sent5: The scent of lavender lingered on the freshly washed linen sheets.

meanings.sent1: The bride looked stunning in her flowing linen gown.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the cool touch of linen on hot summer days.
